traits.Earth Glide: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.
traits.Magic Resistance: The seer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The seer uses Fission Staff twice, Psychedelic Orb twice, or each one once.
actions.Fission Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d10 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is knocked prone.
actions.Psychedelic Orb: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19+1d10 + 14 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a d6 for the condition: (1-2) blinded, (3-4) frightened, or (5-6) stunned.
